ygData.subject: Re: Revelations...
ygData.msgSnippet: To answer all of you I am going to tell you. I m going to get level 19, which won t take me long at all, and check it out tonight. I m  just holding back a
ygData.messageBody:
To answer all of you I am going to tell you. I'm going to get level 19,
which won't take me long at all, and check it out tonight. I'm just holding
back a little because I want to deliver a full report, which would be the
most useful to us all, rather than just giving you the information and that
all. The next message I send should be later tonight. I think I will be able
to include a full report and account. I will do it as soon as I can.

Until then, good luck friends.

> > Well than, Mr Buser. You can belive what you want, and you can choose
>not
>to
> > listen, or belive what I tell you, but I have information, and I think
>it
> > could assist us all greatly. If you disagree, then you can go about your
>own
> > way to finding the fishing pole, or the thirs book, or whatever our goal
>is.
>
>oh, I'd gladly believe in you and worship you, if you tell us where instead
>of playing games.
>
>---
